title: The use of deep eutectic solvents as a promising approach in the design of microwave-based green gas sensors
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00470H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Emilie Bertrand, Mohamed Himdi, David Rondeau, Xavier Castel, Thomas Delhaye, Ludovic Paquin
Highlighting the use of deep eutectic solvent (DES) as the sensitive material of a new sustainable microwave gas sensor through the development of a simple and low-cost device sensitive to hydrogen chloride.
